attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
id like to see the new stand at west brom called the bomber brown stand as an alternative to the mediocre west stand. 

if you would like to see our best ever player recognised then please sign.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
